channel.title: Desperate help
channel.description: Hi, well I've made a thread a couple hours back and I wanted to see if someone could help me with my server. I've deleted my old source as it had alot of trouble and only myself could connect. Tried using rs ps org and when someone logged in , it would freeze/kick them off. I wanted to see if someone can help me with using another source , just to see if I'm doing everything right because this is probably the 4th time I try to set up a server and only I can connect. Please send me a PM , I have TV.

item.title: Desperate help
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

you need to use your own client or use a different source that has a client that is working after that go in your client and change the ip to your ip save compile and if theres no errors and it works and it says your servers online then send the client to your friends after you make it a .zip.

Read full topic

item.description:

yeah make sure its the right client.

item.title: Desperate help
item.dc:creator: @samoankilla samoankilla
item.description:
@samoankilla wrote:

The client is incompatible. Does your server have UID enabled?

Read full topic

item.title: Desperate help

item.description:
@N_3_X wrote:

It is correctly port forwaded , as you can see here

Read full topic

item.title: Desperate help
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Well, if you portforward correctly, and get no-ip from no-ip.org, it should work. After you portforward go to canyouseeme.org and type in port, and if it says success, then you can have your server online.

Read full topic
